63#define UARTn(n) ((UART0_Type*)(UART0_BASE + (n * (UART1_BASE - UART0_BASE))))

71//*****************************************************************************
72typedef enum
73{
74 AM_HAL_UART_CONTROL_CLKSEL,
75} am_hal_uart_control_e;
76
77//*****************************************************************************
78//
80//
81//*****************************************************************************
82typedef enum
83{
84 eUART_CLK_SPEED_DEFAULT = 0,
85 eUART_CLK_SPEED_NOCLK = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_NOCLK + 1,
86 eUART_CLK_SPEED_24MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_24MHZ + 1,
87 eUART_CLK_SPEED_12MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_12MHZ + 1,
88 eUART_CLK_SPEED_6MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_6MHZ + 1,
89 eUART_CLK_SPEED_3MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_3MHZ + 1,
90 eUART_CLK_SPEED_INVALID,
91} am_hal_uart_clock_speed_e;

100typedef struct
101{
102 //
104 //
105 uint32_t ui32BaudRate;
106 uint32_t ui32DataBits;
107 uint32_t ui32Parity;
108 uint32_t ui32StopBits;
109 uint32_t ui32FlowControl;
110
111 //
113 //
114 uint32_t ui32FifoLevels;
115
116 //
118 //
119 uint8_t *pui8TxBuffer;
120 uint32_t ui32TxBufferSize;
121 uint8_t *pui8RxBuffer;
122 uint32_t ui32RxBufferSize;
123}
124am_hal_uart_config_t;

135{

140
142 uint8_t *pui8Data;
143
145 uint32_t ui32NumBytes;
146
156 uint32_t ui32TimeoutMs;
157
159 uint32_t *pui32BytesTransferred;
160}
161am_hal_uart_transfer_t;

171//*****************************************************************************
172//
175//
176//*****************************************************************************
177#define AM_HAL_UART_WRITE 0
178#define AM_HAL_UART_READ 1
179#define AM_HAL_UART_WAIT_FOREVER 0xFFFFFFFF
181
182//*****************************************************************************
183//
185//
186//*****************************************************************************
187
188//*****************************************************************************
189//
192//
193//*****************************************************************************
194#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 3))
195#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_7 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 2))
196#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_6 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 1))
197#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_5 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 0))
199
200//*****************************************************************************
201//
204//
205//*****************************************************************************
206#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_NONE 0
207#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_ODD UART0_LCRH_PEN_Msk
208#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_EVEN (UART0_LCRH_PEN_Msk | \
209 UART0_LCRH_EPS_Msk)
211
212//*****************************************************************************
213//
216//
217//*****************************************************************************
218#define AM_HAL_UART_ONE_STOP_BIT (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_STP2, 0))
219#define AM_HAL_UART_TWO_STOP_BITS (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_STP2, 1))
221
222//*****************************************************************************
223//
226//
227//*****************************************************************************
228#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_NONE 0
229#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_CTS_ONLY UART0_CR_CTSEN_Msk
230#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_RTS_ONLY UART0_CR_RTSEN_Msk
231#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_RTS_CTS (UART0_CR_CTSEN_Msk | \
232 UART0_CR_RTSEN_Msk)
234//*****************************************************************************
235//
238//
239//*****************************************************************************
240#define AM_HAL_UART_FIFO_ENABLE (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_FEN, 1))
241#define AM_HAL_UART_FIFO_DISABLE (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_FEN, 0))
243
244//*****************************************************************************
245//
248//
249//*****************************************************************************
250#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 0))
251#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 1))
252#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_2 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 2))
253#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_3_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 3))
254#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_7_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 4))
256
257//*****************************************************************************
258//
261//
262//*****************************************************************************
263#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 0))
264#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 1))
265#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_2 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 2))
266#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_3_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 3))
267#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_7_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 4))
269
270//*****************************************************************************
271//
274//
275//*****************************************************************************
276#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_OVER_RUN UART0_IER_OEIM_Msk
277#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_BREAK_ERR UART0_IER_BEIM_Msk
278#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_PARITY_ERR UART0_IER_PEIM_Msk
279#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_FRAME_ERR UART0_IER_FEIM_Msk
280#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_RX_TMOUT UART0_IER_RTIM_Msk
281#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_TX UART0_IER_TXIM_Msk
282#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_RX UART0_IER_RXIM_Msk
283#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_DSRM UART0_IER_DSRMIM_Msk
284#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_DCDM UART0_IER_DCDMIM_Msk
285#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_CTSM UART0_IER_CTSMIM_Msk
286#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_TXCMP UART0_IER_TXCMPMIM_Msk
288
289//*****************************************************************************
290//
297//
298//*****************************************************************************
299#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_EMPTY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_TXFE, UART0_FR_TXFE_XMTFIFO_EMPTY))
300#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_RX_FULL (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_RXFF, UART0_FR_RXFF_RCVFIFO_FULL))
301#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_FULL (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_TXFF, UART0_FR_TXFF_XMTFIFO_FULL))
302#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_RX_EMPTY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_RXFE, UART0_FR_RXFE_RCVFIFO_EMPTY))
303#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_BUSY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_BUSY, UART0_FR_BUSY_BUSY))
304#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_DCD_DETECTED (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_DCD, UART0_FR_DCD_DETECTED))
305#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_DSR_READY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_DSR, UART0_FR_DSR_READY))
306#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_CTS UART0_FR_CTS_Msk
